substitution.copyText: I think it was to my Mothers Wedding.
substitution.amendedText: I think, it was to my Mothers Wedding.

substitution.copyText: Would I had met my dearest foe in heaven
substitution.amendedText: Would I had met my direst foe in heaven

substitution.copyText: My father, methinks I see my father.
substitution.amendedText: My father - methinks, I see my father!

substitution.copyText: Ham. In my minds eye Horatio.
By their own opprest and fear surprized eyes
Within this truncheons length, whilst they distill'd
substitution.amendedText: Within my Rapier's length, whilst they distill'd

substitution.copyText: They did impart in dreadful secresie,
substitution.amendedText: in dreadful secresie, impart they did,

substitution.copyText: The apparition comes: " I knew your father, | " These hands are not more like.
